00030 #include "declerations.h"
00031 
00032 void saveAsAdjacencyMatrix( matrix &M, list<node> A, list<node> B, char filename[] ){
00033 
00034         FILE *fptr;
00035         fptr = fopen( filename, "w" );
00036 
00037         M.print();
00038         for( int i = 0; i < M.dim1(); i++ ){ 
00039                 for( int j = 0; j < M.dim2(); j++ ){
00040                         fprintf( fptr, "%f\t", (double)M( i, j ) );
00041                 }
00042                 fprintf( fptr, "\n" );
00043         }
00044         fclose( fptr );
00045 }
